response.overview: William Tell just wants to play cards. His spartan existence on the casino trail is shattered when he is approached by Cirk, a vulnerable and angry young man seeking help to execute his plan for revenge on a military colonel. Tell sees a chance at redemption through his relationship with Cirk. But keeping Cirk on the straight-and-narrow proves impossible, dragging Tell back into the darkness of his past.
response.tagline: He's Playing the Hand He Was Dealt.
response.title: The Card Counter

release_dates.note: Film by the Sea Film Festival
